metadata.narrative: Sentinels punished the Rivals on second-chance points; late-game offensive stagnation cost Phoenix a chance to close.

playerBios.name: Jordan Ellis
playerBios.playingStyle: Tempo guard; primary initiator of horns-based actions.
playerBios.seasonNotes: Monitoring workload after minor ankle sprain; minute restriction lifted last week.

playerBios.name: Nia Hart
playerBios.playingStyle: Versatile wing defender, secondary creator on empty-corner sets.
playerBios.seasonNotes: Increasing usage as on-ball screener to create mismatches.

playerBios.name: Isaac Long
playerBios.seasonNotes: Working on quicker second jumps for contested boards.

coachStrategies.name: Arjun Patel
coachStrategies.gamePlan: Exploit Sentinels' slow-footed guards via spread pick-and-roll.
adjustments: Shifted to double drag screens to free Hart downhill in Q2.
Closed with small-ball lineup to chase perimeter shooting.

coachStrategies.name: Lena Cho
coachStrategies.gamePlan: Limit offensive rebounds with gang-rebounding emphasis.
adjustments: Implemented wedge box-outs after halftime to counter Sentinels' crash scheme.
Late switch to top-locking shooters; left paint exposed for putbacks.

events.description: Hart scored 8 straight, brought Rivals within 1 before bench unit faltered.
events.impact: Demonstrated effective small-ball spacing; lineup data to revisit.

events.description: Sentinels secured offensive rebound and hit dagger three.
events.impact: Illustrated rebounding deficit; need for situational boxing-out drills.

events.description: Ellis tweaked ankle; limited burst rest of game.
events.impact: Reduced rim pressure; forced reliance on contested jumpers.

metrics.notes: Allowed 17 offensive rebounds; half-court offense dropped to 0.94 PPP in Q4.
